body:
Hi Daniel


Oops, yes!
I meant to add a couple of links to the previous message, 
but they slipped away somehow.
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiancewiki/doku.php/standard_unix_distribution


Main link to the Radiance KB (wiki):
http://www.bozzograo.net/radiancewiki/doku.php


Thanks,


F.




-----Messaggio originale-----
Da: radiance-general-bounces at radiance-online.org per conto di Daniel Reetz
Inviato: ven 26/10/2007 00:03
A: Radiance general discussion
Oggetto: Re: [Radiance-general] Radiance Knowledge Base: help needed


Hi Francesco,


For those of us new to the list, (though perhaps not new to Radiance)
can you please give a little more information, like the location of
the Radiance Knowledge Base?


Regards,
Daniel Reetz
